title: updating to 5.0.7 fails
body:
### expected behaviour
updates completes, maintenance mode is turned off.

### actual behaviour
update did not complete, maintenance mode is not turned off.
instead, the following error message is shown:
updating owncloud to version 5.0.7, this may take a while.

turned on maintenance mode
failed to update database structure (mdb2 error: unknown error, _doquery: [error message: could not execute statement] [last executed query: drop index "oc_vcategory_to_object_objid_check"] [native message: error: current transaction is aborted, commands ignored until end of transaction block] )

the update was unsuccessful. please report this issue to the owncloud community.

### steps to reproduce
sudo apt-get upgrade

### server configuration
operating system: ubuntu raring

web server: apache 2.2.22

database: postgres 9.1

php version: php 5.4.9

owncloud version: owncloud 5.0.5

### client configuration
browser: firefox 22.0 & safari 6.0.5

operating system: macosx mountain lion 10.8.4

### logs
#### web server error log
```
no owncloud specific log entries.
```

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
file does not exist.
```

#### browser log
```
safari error console:
failed to load resource: the server responded with a status of 503 (service temporarily unavailable)
https://stoeff.ath.cx/owncloud/index.php/core/ajax/translations.phpfailed to load resource: the server responded with a status of 503 (service temporarily unavailable)
```
